typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceMovie
SourceMovie alterRow(updateIf(title == '20,000 leagues Under the Sea'),
	deleteIf(year < 1900 || isNull(year))) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow derive(title = title + '(' + toString(year) + ')') ~> Transformation
Transformation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['movie'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkDestination
